subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species
:
Macrotrichia deltata
sp. n.
Etymology. The name of the new genus refers to many long fine setae on inner margin of the style.
Male 8 th sternite twice longer than 7 th sternite, posterior margin strongly concave medially (Figs. 13, 20 ).

Female 7 th sternite with posterior margin concave, V-shaped (Fig. 14 ); first valvulae sword-like, with submarginal striation sculpture dorsally; second valvulae blade-like, with several apical teeth dorsally (Figs. 7–10 ).
